title: Distributed Work-Reward Mechanism
description: Rewarding intangible work in a DAO is not transparent or scalable. There is too much focus on $ allocation before contribution attribution.
solution: Develop an open-source attribution, valuation & reward system based on a Distributed Co-Op approach.
experience: SecretDecks has 5 core members with backgrounds in product & project management, editorial, philosophy & web development (See Detailed Plan)
